pages.title: Note Block Tuners
pages.text: To make it easier to make large note block songs, you can use a note block tuner. Right clicking in air or while sneaking lets you change the mode. Apply mode lets you either listen to the tuner's note, or set a note block to it. Copy mode copies the note of a note block. Adjust mode lets you manually adjust the tuner's note.

pages.title: Gallery
pages.text: All three tuner modes, plus a demonstration of using a tuner.
